amendment.description: To expand the authority for awarding technology prizes by the Secretary of Energy to include a financial award for separation of carbon dioxide from dilute sources.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3017 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3017 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S245-247; text: CR S246) To expand the authority for awarding technology prizes by the Secretary of Energy to include a financial award for separation of carbon dioxide from dilute sources.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3017 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3017 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
